properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 8 at 3:09AM PST until February 9 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...Updated wind direction.

* WHAT...Northwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph this
afternoon becoming northeast late tonight and Sunday. Waves 1
to 3 feet.

* WHERE...Pyramid Lake.

* WHEN...From 10 AM today to 10 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to
capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions
improve. Wave heights will be highest on southern shores today,
but will shift to the western shores on Sunday as wind direction
changes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust may restrict visibility around
western Nevada.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE
